entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 6. Wind chill minus 6 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Thursday 13 April 2023
